title: Enacts the "owner-driver protection act" to make public work standards applicable to owner-drivers
summary: Enacts the "owner-driver protection act"; requires public work contractors and subcontractors employing owner-drivers on public work projects to pay the prevailing rate of wage, provide appropriate supplements and provide workers' compensation and disability coverage to such drivers.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to owner-drivers employed on public work projects
